ColourWords.Title: Countable and uncountable nouns
ColourWords.Instruction: One word in each sentence is wrong. Click on the incorrect word.

ContentColourWords.Sentence: 1 That'savery good advice. I'll tell my brother too!
2 Do you like acoffee or do you prefer tea?
3 I'm so thirsty. Can I have a glass of anywater?
4 Can you pass me a somepiece of paper?
5 I've got some money. I've got about thefifty Euros.
6 We've run out of someice cream. Can you get some in the supermarket?
7 Would you like piecea muffin? They're delicious!
8 We eat many oftypes of pasta.
9 This book doesn't contain much ofuseful information.
10 There aren't themany computers that are faster than this one.
